text: @realDonaldTrump 40 million people are unemployed; businesses are hurting; we're dealing with the coronavirus- but putting those major/serious issues aside, our focus should be on Trump's inability to unite our country & what he's doing to weaken our democracy.  Listen to General Mattis.
